data.title: Diced steak stir-fry
data.summary: Dices steak done in a stir-fry style
data.contents:
Ingredients

  • 500g diced steak
  • pack of stir-fry veg
  • ginger
  • 1 tbsp white rice vineger
  • 1 tbsp honey
  • mushrooms
  • 3 garlic cloves
  • 1 tbsp soy sauce

Optional Ingredients

  • chillies
  • sesame seeds
  • peppers

Instructions

  1. Prepare the mushrooms, ginger and garlic cloves

  2. Start cooking the diced steak

  3. Add in the veg

  4. Add in the rest of the ingredients to make the sauce
